reviewText: Out dated but still a QUALITY Dvd from In-Fisherman! To me THEY ARE THE EXPERTS in Fishing and being new to Ice Fishing this will help! Only problem I encountered is after a segments it skips to the individual chapters.which is strange but there is NO SKIPS in the DVD itself! Maybe it was recorded or transferred that way! but I bought it used for $2.00...........so what the heck!!!!!!!! One GREAT bargin!!!!! I recommend the DVD!
Information is dated as new techniques and info have developed but very good for the beginner or as reference for experienced fishermen.
A good buy. Product was a gift and the person who received the gift was pleased with it. I would recommend.

Don't judge a book by its cover, nor a DVD.  I love the old In-Fisherman guys as much as the next guy, but all this dvd was good for was a walk down memory lane.  The footage was all over 20 years old and the sport has evolved so much since then.  The info provided is good for a first timer, but lacks any of the technological advances of the sport.
